FOOTER.EMAIL_SUBSCRIBE_SUCCESS: Thank you for subscribing to the our news and offers!

HOME.APPS_TEXT: The complete guide with interactive map, gps positioning, find my car & tent, party schedule activities and hot notifications.

TICKETS.TAG_LINE: Choose what suits you the best

MESSAGES.NOTHING_SELECTED: Please select the ticket you want and the desired quantity
MESSAGES.FINALIZE: Looking good! Now finalize your order
MESSAGES.NO_TICKET_SELECTED: Please select at least one ticket
MESSAGES.NO_CAMPING_SELECTED: Select one camping option or check 'No thanks'

CONTROLS.NO_CAMPING: No thanks, I don't need camping
CONTROLS.CAMPING_WARNING: Are you sure? The camping tickets are limited!

ADD.TITLE: The ticket had been added to your basket
ADD.MESSAGE: You've just added 1 x {{ticketName}} ({{ticketPrice}}) tickets to your basket

REMOVE.TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this ticket?

WAITING.REGISTER_MESSAGE: Register to get a chance of buying one of the first 5000 tickets!

BASKET.NO_PRODUCT: You currently do not have any products added to your basket.

ERROR.QUANTITY_EXCEEDED: Please check your order history or your basket.

ORDERS.NO_ORDER: You currently do not have any orders.

REGISTER.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your account data has been successfully updated.

CHANGE_PASSWORD.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully changed

RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email address and we'll help you reset your password.
RESET_PASSWORD.UPDATE_SUCCESS: An email has been sent to {{emailAddress}}. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.

VALIDATIONS_ERRORS.NOT_A_VALID_EMAIL: The email is not in the proper format.
VALIDATIONS_ERRORS.NOT_A_VALID_PHONE_NUMBER: The entered value is not a valid phone number.
VALIDATIONS_ERRORS.NOT_A_VALID_DATE: Please enter the date in the following format {{acceptedFormat}}
VALIDATIONS_ERRORS.MUST_MATCH: Please enter the same password again.

SUCCESS.TITLE: All good! The payment has been made.
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION:
You will receive details about your ticket(s) and all the information you need in your email. See you at the Castle!

WE ARE THE PEOPLE!

FAILED.TITLE: Something went wrong with your payment!
FAILED.DESCRIPTION:
Something went wrong with your payment! We are looking into it and we’re trying to solve this as fast as we can.
If need help, don’t hesitate to contact us: contact@electriccastle.ro.
Thanks!
